mapper.insert:
insert into zy-community.sys_menu(menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.isFrame}, #{entity.isCache}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into zy-community.sys_menu(menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.isFrame}, #{entity.isCache}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update menu_name = values(menu_name) , parent_id = values(parent_id) , order_num = values(order_num) , path = values(path) , component = values(component) , is_frame = values(is_frame) , is_cache = values(is_cache) , menu_type = values(menu_type) , visible = values(visible) , status = values(status) , perms = values(perms) , icon = values(icon) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , remark = values(remark)
